Requirement Description: The system should allow a user with valid credentials to log in successfully
Test Case Name: Login with valid standard_user credentials

Requirement Description: The system should show an error when the wrong password is entered
Test Case Name: Login with wrong password shows error message

Requirement Description: The system should show an error when username and password fields are empty
Test Case Name: Login with empty username and password shows error

Requirement Description: A locked out user should not be able to log in and should see a clear message
Test Case Name: Locked out user cannot log in

Requirement Description: The system should show an error when password field is left empty on login
Test Case Name: Login with only username filled shows error

Requirement Description: The user should be able to dismiss the login error message
Test Case Name: Error message can be dismissed by clicking the X button

Requirement Description: The Products page should display all 6 available products after login
Test Case Name: Products page shows 6 products after login

Requirement Description: The user should be able to sort products by price from lowest to highest
Test Case Name: Products can be sorted by Price (low to high)

Requirement Description: The user should be able to sort products by name in reverse alphabetical order
Test Case Name: Products can be sorted by Name (Z to A)

Requirement Description: Clicking a product name should open the product detail page
Test Case Name: Clicking a product name opens the product detail page

Requirement Description: Adding a product to cart should show a badge count on the cart icon
Test Case Name: Adding a product to cart updates the cart badge count

Requirement Description: Adding multiple products should show the correct total count on the cart badge
Test Case Name: Adding multiple products shows correct count in cart badge

Requirement Description: Removing a product from the Products page should decrease the cart badge count
Test Case Name: Removing a product from the Products page updates cart badge

Requirement Description: The Cart page should show the correct product name description quantity and price
Test Case Name: Cart page shows the correct products that were added

Requirement Description: The user should be able to remove a product directly from the Cart page
Test Case Name: User can remove a product directly from the Cart page

Requirement Description: The user should be able to complete Checkout Step 1 with valid name and zip code
Test Case Name: User can complete checkout step 1 with valid information

Requirement Description: Checkout Step 1 should show an error if First Name is not filled in
Test Case Name: Checkout step 1 shows error when First Name is missing

Requirement Description: Checkout Step 1 should show an error if Zip Code is not filled in
Test Case Name: Checkout step 1 shows error when Zip Code is missing

Requirement Description: The Checkout Overview page should display the correct product name and price
Test Case Name: Checkout overview page shows correct item name and price

Requirement Description: Clicking Finish should show an order confirmation message
Test Case Name: User sees order confirmation after clicking Finish

Requirement Description: The Back Home button on the confirmation page should return the user to the Products page
Test Case Name: Back Home button after order confirmation returns to Products page

Requirement Description: The user should be able to log out from the hamburger menu
Test Case Name: User can log out from the hamburger menu

Requirement Description: A logged out user should not be able to access the Products page directly via URL
Test Case Name: Accessing inventory page directly after logout is not allowed
